channel.title: PTR x13 bug on inquisitor, DK and CW/CL interaction
channel.description:
#### What happened?
[PTR x13] #1 Night2: CW [12] used Tornado on 10 and 12. 10 is Inquisitor. Cult Leader [9] used Eradicate on 2 and 12. Visit on 2 got prevented. 2nd part of Eradicate on 12 did not get redirected to 10 and killed 12. #2 Death Knight can "pretend" to accuse players and spam the chat. #3 Inquisitor win is shown as Scorned win at the end of the game.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
#1 2nd part of Eradicate should be redirected by Tornado to 10 and 12 will survive. #2 No chat msg, when Death Knight tries to accuse someone or DK should be blocked from accusing. #3 Inquisitor as a winner.
